title: Pita Way
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Hummus, baba gannoush, grape leaves, tabouli, and some salads are vegan. The falafel sandwich is vegan and cooked in separate fryer. Vegan potato chop (mashed potato ball stuffed with green peas, mushrooms and spices) are deep fried in separate fryer.
